Imports

strutils, xmlparser, xmltree, streams

Types

EPUBIdentifier* = tuple[id: string, value: string]
EPUBTitle* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBLanguage* = tuple[id: string, value: string]
EPUBContributor* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBCreator* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBSource* = tuple[id: string, value: string]
EPUBType* = tuple[id: string, value: string]
EPUBDescription* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBFormat* = tuple[id: string, value: string]
EPUBPublisher* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBRelation* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBRights* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBSubject* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBCoverage* = tuple[id: string, lang: string, dir: string, value: string]
EPUBMeta* = tuple[property: string, refines: string, id: string, scheme: string, 
                  value: string]
EPUBLink* = tuple[href: string, rel: string, id: string, refines: string, 
                  mediaType: string]
EPUBMetadata* = tuple[identifiers: seq[EPUBIdentifier], titles: seq[EPUBTitle], 
                      languages: seq[EPUBLanguage], 
                      contributors: seq[EPUBContributor], 
                      creators: seq[EPUBCreator], date: string, 
                      source: EPUBSource, epubType: EPUBType, 
                      metas: seq[EPUBMeta], description: EPUBDescription, 
                      format: EPUBFormat, publisher: EPUBPublisher, 
                      relation: EPUBRelation, rights: EPUBRights, 
                      subject: EPUBSubject, coverage: EPUBCoverage, 
                      links: seq[EPUBLink]]
EPUBItem* = tuple[id: string, href: string, mediaType: string, fallback: string, 
                  properties: string, mediaOverlay: string]
EPUBManifest* = tuple[id: string, items: seq[EPUBItem]]
EPUBItemref* = tuple[idref: string, linear: string, id: string, 
                     properties: string]
EPUBSpine* = tuple[id: string, toc: string, pageProgressionDirection: string, 
                   itemrefs: seq[EPUBItemref]]
EPUBMediaType* = tuple[mediaType: string, handler: string]
EPUBBindings* = tuple[mediaTypes: seq[EPUBMediaType]]
EPUBPackage* = tuple[version: string, uniqueIdentifier: string, lang: string, 
                     dir: string, id: string, metadata: EPUBMetadata, 
                     manifest: EPUBManifest, spine: EPUBSpine, 
                     bindings: EPUBBindings]
EPUBRootFile* = tuple[fullPath: string, mediaType: string]

Procs

proc getPackageDocument*(filename: string): string
Gets the location of the package document. filename is the location of the EPUB directory. Returns an empty string if no valid package document was found. 
proc parseContainer*(filename: string): seq[EPUBRootFile]
Returns a sequence representing the rootfile elements in the container document. filename is the location of the EPUB directory. 
proc parsePackageDocument*(filename: string): EPUBPackage
Parses the package document. filename is the location of the EPUB directory.
